muclient.triggers:
<trigger group="smugs" keep_evaluating="y" match="^You follow .* (?north|northeast|east|southeast|south|southwest|west|northwest)\.$" name="smugs_you_follow" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" script="on_trigger_smugs_you_follow" >
<trigger group="smugs" keep_evaluating="y" lines_to_match="2" multi_line="y" match="^(There are no obvious exits|There is one obvious exit: down|A (dingy tunnel|small chamber) \[(none|d)\])\.\n(?.*) here\.\Z" name="smugs_mob_here" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" script="on_trigger_smugs_mob_track" >
muclient.aliases: <alias group="smugs" name="smugs_move_room" match="^(?n|ne|e|se|s|sw|w|nw|north|northeast|east|southeast|south|southwest|west|northwest|look|l)$" regexp="y" ignore_case="y" sequence="100" script="on_alias_smugs_move_room" >
